Know how often you can donate and make maximum impact on lives

ü©π Whole Blood

Helps all blood types

6
Frequency:Every 56 days
Annual:6x per year
Recovery:3-4 weeks

üíõ Plasma

Golden component

24
Frequency:Every 2 days
Annual:24x per year
Recovery:24 hours

üíö Platelets

Helps cancer patients

24
Frequency:Every 2 days
Annual:24x per year
Recovery:24 hours

Critical for anemia

3
Frequency:Every 112 days
Annual:3x per year
Recovery:8 weeks

üí° Pro Tip: O- blood type donors are the most sought after because they can donate to anyone. If you have a rare blood type, you're a superhero for those who need it!

One blood donation can save up to 3 lives. A single donation in Delhi today helped 3 emergency patients.
